result.purpose: A Google App Engine application that responds to HTTP requests with a welcoming message.
result.architecture: The folder follows a simple structure with a main application file (app.go), a configuration file (app.yaml), and documentation (README.md).

appengine-hello/README.md.purpose: Documentation for a Google App Engine application in Go.

appengine-hello/app.go.purpose: A simple App Engine application that replies to requests on /hello with a welcoming message.
side_effects: Registers a handler for the /hello route

appengine-hello/app.yaml.purpose: Configuration file for a Google App Engine application
